sentences.sContent: The people of an oppressed country obey their conquerors because they want to go on living.
sentences.sCn: 一个被压迫国家的人民顺从他们的征服者，是因为他们想活下去。

phrases.pCn: 征服者威廉（英国国王威廉一世，等于William I）

trans.tranOther: The conquerors of a country or group of people are the people who have taken complete control of that country or group's land
